title: (x) Light weight for DIN 1451 MittelSchrift - FF DIN {Adriano E}
content:
OK, am I showing my ignorance here? Is there a [DIN 1451 MittelSchrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111120038/http:/www.linotype.com/306/din1451-family.html) light? I’ve never seen a light version in the family before, but I am sure what I have in front of me is just that.

Thanks in advance for setting me straight.

(I can post an example later, if needed).
author: higashi

comments.content: I think that what you want is the [FF DIN Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111120038/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.9467.11.1).

My ignorance then! Sometimes posting here is much quicker than using your own brain… cheers adriano.

<cite>Everyone else please ignore initial post!</cite>
